entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 11:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain or rain this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 20 overnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Fog patches. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
